domain.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class. This class keeps the information related to the Players in the game.

      • buyProperty

        public void buyProperty(domain.square.PropertySquare property)
        Buy property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Modifies:
        ownedProperties, money, PropertySquare.owner
        Effects:
        Checks if the player can buy the property that he is on. If player can buy it, player buys the property.Decreases the money of the player by the price. Adds it to player's inventory. Also sets the property's owner to the player.

      • sellProperty

        public void sellProperty(Property property)
        Sell property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        Effects:
        Player sells the property

      • payRent

        public void payRent(Player owner,
                    int rent)
        Pay rent.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner
        rent - the rent
        Modifies:
        this.money, owner.money
        Effects:
        If player can afford, player pays the rent to the owner of the property. Decreases the money of the payer, increases the money of the owner by the rent price.

      • canAfford

        public boolean canAfford(int upcomingExpanditure)
        Can afford.
        Parameters:
        upcomingExpanditure - the amount that is provisioned to be deducted from player's money
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Effects:
        Decides if the player can afford the next move(buyProperty, payRent, buildHouse etc.)

      • drawCard

        public void drawCard()
        Draw a card from the deck.

      • buildSkyscraper

        public void buildSkyscraper(domain.square.LotSquare p)
        Builds the skyscraper.
        Parameters:
        p - the price
        Modifies:
        this.money, this.ownedBuildings
        Effects:
        Checks if player can afford to build a skyscraper. If yes, player's money is decreased. Skyscraper is added to the player's ownedBuildings list.

      • buildHotel

        public void buildHotel(domain.square.LotSquare p)
        Builds the hotel.
        Parameters:
        p - the p
        Modifies:
        this.money, this.ownedBuildings
        Effects:
        Checks if player can afford to build a hotel. If yes, player's money is decreased. Hotel is added to the player's ownedBuildings list.
